eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\nonumber
&& E = \int d\boldsymbol{k} \;\omega_{\boldsymbol{k}} f_{\boldsymbol{k}} 
g_{\boldsymbol{k}}\;,\\
\nonumber
&& N = \int d\boldsymbol{k} \;f_{\boldsymbol{k}} g_{\boldsymbol{k}}\;.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\nonumber
&&\frac{1}{g^2}F\bigg\vert_{\theta=0} = -\frac{16\pi^2}{g^2} + 
\frac32\left[\frac{\pi^2E^4}{g^2 v^4}\right]^{1/3} + O(E^2/v^2)\;,\\
\nonumber
&&\frac{1}{g^2}F\bigg\vert_{N=0} = -\frac{16\pi^2}{g^2} + 3
\left[\frac{3 E^4}{8 \pi^2 g^2 v^4}\right]^{1/3}
+ O(E^2/v^2)\;.
\
